title.rendered: Alticor Inc Wins National SMPS Marketing Communications Awards

content.rendered:
Alticor Inc was honored to win the National People’s Choice Award in all categories within architects, engineers and contractors at the Society for Marketing Professional Services (SMPS) Marketing Communications Awards, as well as a National Merit Award, for the Work Hard/Play Hard Recruiting and Retention campaign.

The awards ceremony took place on July 13, 2017, as part of the SMPS Build Business 2017 conference at the JW Marriott Indianapolis. The prestigious SMPS Marketing Communications Awards program recognizes excellence in marketing and communications by professional services firms.

The awards ceremony took place on July 13, 2017, […]
